name: Canberra Accommodation Centre
description:
Canberra Accommodation Centre offers affordable and flexible stays in the heart of Canberra. 
Choose from 140+ hotel-style single and double rooms with shared bathrooms, or spacious ground floor apartments with full kitchens and bathrooms (except one bedsit). Level 8 has budget-friendly singles with desk and wardrobe, while Levels 7 and 9 feature doubles with TVs.

Facilities include coin or app-operated laundry, shared kitchens, and a games lounge with table tennis, pool table, and classic plus modern arcade games. A light rail stop right outside makes getting around the city easy.

Close to key attractions, transport, and dining, we blend hotel comfort with hostel vibes at great rates. Perfect for solo travelers, couples, or groups. Book with us to experience Canberra your way.

groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Booking Terms & Conditions
Payment of Accommodation –
•
Final numbers MUST be received no less than 14 days prior to arrival.
•
If group numbers increase from the original booking, CAC will exhaust all options to accommodation the extra guests, however, space is not guaranteed.
•
If group numbers decrease, CAC is under no obligation to alter the final invoice generated from the final numbers received.
•
All monies are due and payable within 14 days prior to arrival and no refunds are applicable.
Deposits –
•
All bookings require a non-transferable deposit to ensure the booking is held. If the deposit is not received by the agreed due date, CAC reserves the right to cancel all or part of the booking without warning.
Accounts –
•
All accounts must be paid in full prior to arrival.
•
No group will be checked in without full payment being received.
•
Deposits MUST be cleared if paying via direct debit and remittance emailed to groups@canberra-accommodation.com.au
•
Visa and Mastercard payments are available however, payment via this method attract a 1.5% surcharge.
Confirmation of Booking –
•
No booking is confirmed unless the standard deposit of $500.00 has been received by CAC and an email confirmation or remittance from CAC has been generated.
14 days prior to your arrival date, CAC MUST be supplied with:
•
(a) A list of all guests/return of rooming allocation sheet
•
(b) Full details and requests relating to mealtimes, catering choices, dietary requirements and movie night/rec room requirements + any additional requests.
Mealtimes & Catering (if applicable) -
•
Mealtimes must be booked in advance.
•
Breakfast is from 6am to 9am & Dinner is from 5:00pm to 7:30pm
•
Arrangements outside of these times are possible, however, must be organised 14 days in advance of the arrival date and confirmed by CAC.
Cancellations –
•
Cancellations must be made in writing 60 days prior to arrival.
•
If a cancellation is made within the 60 days prior to the booking, 50% of the total value of the booking will be due and payable.
Bookings & Alterations –
•
All bookings and/or booking amendments must be made in writing via email.
•
No bookings are secured without email confirmation from CAC.
Emergency Procedures & First Aid –
•
It is the responsibility of the individual group leader to familiarize themselves with the Emergency Evacuation Procedures displayed throughout the facility. In the event of an emergency, the group leader is expected to coordinate and assist group members in following these procedures to ensure the safety of all individuals within the group.
•
The group leader is also responsible for administering any necessary first aid to members of their group during their stay. While the facility provides information on local medical services and emergency contacts, group leaders should be prepared to handle minor medical situations and bring their own first aid supplies for group needs.
Damage –
•
Any damage to any property at CAC must be reported immediately to staff.
•
Any damaged or missing items will be communicated to the group leader or group organiser and charged accordingly to the group or booking agent.
•
Loss or damage of entry cards will be charged per card.
Liability –
Other than for death or personal injury caused by the negligence of Canberra Accommodation Centre, liability to the client is limited to the price of the booking.
Unless Canberra Accommodation Centre is liable under the above clause, the client indemnifies Canberra Accommodation Centre from and against any and all liability and any claims, proceedings or damages resulting or arising from the booking, event or function, the client guests or any outside contractors of the client.
Canberra Accommodation Centre will not be liable for failure to perform to the extent that the failure is caused by factors beyond its reasonable control.
Canberra Accommodation Centre does not accept responsibility whatsoever for damage to or theft from, or theft of personal items from rooms or vehicles or buses parked on the premises.
Clients or groups are responsible for any damage caused to the allocated rooms, furnishings, utensils and equipment in the, by any act, omission, default or neglect of the clients, their guests or sub-contractors and will pay Canberra Accommodation Centre on demand the amount required to make good or remedy any such damage.
Disclaimer: Canberra Accommodation Centre reserves the right to change, modify, add or remove sections of these terms and to add, change or discontinue the products, programs and information contained in, or any other aspect at any time without notice or liability.

houseRules.notes:
Cancellation policy: 5 day(s) before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay.
Check-in from 2:00 PM to 12:00 AM
Check-out before 10:00 AM
Payment upon arrival by cash, credit and debit cards.
This property will pre-authorize your card before arrival.
Taxes included.
Breakfast not included.

General:
No curfew
No pets allowed.
Children allowed: 1 to 18 years old.
Smoking is allowed in designated areas.
